DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , placebo control , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord disease ( CNS disease without cutaneous involvement v disseminate disease CNS involvement ) . All patient receive acyclovir IV every 8 hour day 1-21 . On day 19 , patient undergo lumbar puncture must negative CSF PCR randomize . If patient positive CSF PCR day 19 , continue receive acyclovir IV every 8 hour . Treatment continue every 7 day repeat CSF PCR fifth day negative CSF PCR result achieve . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive oral acyclovir three time day 6 month . Arm II : Patients receive placebo . In case cutaneous recurrence first 12 month study , patient receive open label oral acyclovir ( CSF PCR negative ) acyclovir IV ( CSF PCR positive ) 5 day . Patients may may continue study drug follow treatment . Patients follow 6 , 12 , 24 , 36 , 48 , 60 month age .
